p: Results are obtained in just over 3 hours, enabling patients to receive results on the same day. The automated extraction platform and PCR instrument have a small footprint and the assay is easy to use even for staff with no formal molecular training making it ideal to use in situations with limited resources. Finally, the assays as described would be ideally suited as general screening tools or for vector surveillance studies, as any flavivirus or alphavirus can be quickly and sensitively detected regardless of the geographical region or viruses endemic in the region.
